clinic_details.name: HealthCare Plus Clinic
clinic_details.location: 123 Medical Center Drive, Suite 200, Healthcare City, NY 10001
clinic_details.directions: Located on the second floor of the Medical Center building. Take elevator from main lobby.
clinic_details.parking: Free parking available in the adjacent parking garage. Validation available at reception.

billing_policies: Payment is due at time of service for copays and deductibles
We submit claims directly to your insurance provider
Payment plans available for large balances

required_documents: Medical records from previous providers (if applicable)
first_visit_procedures: Complete new patient forms (available online or at office)
Bring insurance card and photo ID
what_to_bring: Any relevant medical records or test results
Payment method for copay or self-pay

policies.cancellation_policy: We require 24 hours notice for cancellations. Late cancellations or no-shows may incur a $50 fee.
policies.late_arrival_policy: Please arrive on time. Late arrivals may result in rescheduling or shortened appointment time.
covid19_protocols: If you have COVID-19 symptoms, please reschedule
policies.rescheduling: Reschedule appointments at least 24 hours in advance by calling (555) 123-4567 or using our online portal.
policies.waitlist: We don't maintain a formal waitlist, but please call for last-minute cancellation availability.

consultation.description: General consultation for routine concerns, checkups, or new symptoms

followup.description: Follow-up visit to review test results or check progress

physical.description: Comprehensive physical examination and health screening

specialist.description: Extended consultation with specialist for complex conditions
